projects.title: Quizzy
projects.desc: This is a full-stack app that I created for self-learning purposes to understand Ruby on Rails. This app uses React as a frontend technology and Ruby on Rails for the backend.

projects.title: Granite
projects.desc: This is a full-stack app that I created for interns in my previous company(BigBinary) to make them understand Ruby on Rails. This app uses React as a frontend technology and Ruby on Rails for the backend.

projects.title: Polly
projects.desc: This is a full-stack app where user can give polls which anyone has created. This app uses React as a frontend technology and Ruby on Rails for the backend

projects.title: ProShop
projects.desc: This is a shopping app made using MERN and redux, having all the main functionality of an e-commerce website.

projects.title: M-Drive
projects.desc: M-drive app is built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS) and AWS S3. User can create their account and store their files/folder to the AWS S3 bucket.

projects.title: GitHub Finder
projects.desc: Search Github users, made using React hooks & context

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.desc: Track covid-19 cases across the world and analyse the data with the help of graphs.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.desc: It is small application made using HTML/CSS/JS and Node/Express for API. Using this app you can generate short url for any big url

projects.title: Gmail Clone
projects.desc: Gmail Clone is a Javascript Web application, made using GMAIL API service, where the user can compose or check their emails.

projects.title: Recipe Finder
projects.desc: Recipe Finder is a Javascript Web application, where the user can look & search for their favourite recipes

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.desc: My first react app, Amazon Clone, made it using React and Firebase, to understand the basics of react

projects.title: My Chat App
projects.desc: This is a simple chatting application made using node, react, and socket.io. This app I made it to understand the flow of socket.io
